channel.title: AMA with patio11 - loads of advice
channel.description:
http://inbound.org/discussion/view/i-m-patrick-mckenzie-patio11-i-make-and-sell-software-ask-me-anything
Lots of useful advice on a variety of topics, many of which are very much related to bootstrapping. Worth a read!
